Introduction¶

Welcome to the FEtC-H’s documentation! This Django project allows a user to apply a research project for ethical review. It was custom-tailored for the Faculty Ethics Committee - Humanities (FEtC-H) of Utrecht University.

This documentation is meant to give (new) maintainers/developers of the codebase a general overview of the project and to document procedure.

For reference, a code reference is also included. This reference is auto-generated using the docstrings in the code. (And with some fancy tricks Django Model metadata is also used.)
